name: STRENGTH. STRENGTH. STRENGTH
description:
60% Cotton, 40% Polyester blend,very comfortable. Does not stretch much when your training for your cancer walk.

Available in a deep V neck and standard neck line.

Help us to prevent Cancer from taking any more family and friends.

name: Proverbs 31 Girl
description:
Proverbs 31 long sleeve Waffle Hoodie in white
with self fabric draw string
Cotton blend combed ring spun 
Pre - laundered fabric 4.1 oz



  Proverbs 31 Girl
I’ve made so many wrong choices in women.
I’ve been with young women, tall women, pretty women, not so attractive women, joyful women, smart women, fun women, even drop-dead gorgeous women.
I have been with Playboy centerfolds and models and have had relationships based on just sex.
I don’t know that I have been in what I would call a healthy well-balanced REALationship
I’ve made choices in women mostly based on looks or a beautiful body.
I’ve tried to force people to be something they were not.
I have decided I should choose based on other criteria-I’ve thought a lot about that criteria.
One day, I was reading the bible and stumbled on a couple of verses….(God was talking to me)
It said: "Charm is Deceptive and Beauty fades."
I read this in Proverbs.
I continued to read on all about the Proverbs girl.
The qualities of a GOod woman are….
A VIRTUOUS woman is TRUSTWORTHY and lives with DIGNITY, KINDNESS and STRENGTH.
 I search now for these qualities in a woman.
 I decided to put them on a woman so to speak.
You can become this too; use this shirt as a symbol.
Put this shirt on, and with it, these traits. And in your life, behave as such from this day forward.
This shirt comes in white only, which to me is a sign of purity, just like a wedding dress.

name: Forgivin
description:
Designed in soft Pima form fitting cotton, for all day comfort.

100 % Cotton, Combed Ring Spun,  
Pre - laundered fabric 4.1 oz 

Forgiven

She told me: "I drank until I became an alcoholic.
I drank till I received my first DUI.... I drank even after I had a Major accident and had to have reconstructive surgery on my face. I drank, and my next drink cost me 30 days in jail. When the Alcohol would not dull the pain, I tried Cocaine. When the cocaine would not give me peace. I tried sex and had Relationship after Relationship. I used my body... I looked everywhere to try to escape the prison bars of Guilt/Pain/Sorrow and shame I had created by deciding to end two human lives almost two decades ago. I was on a crash course caused by me. Because of the secret I had been carrying deep inside my heart that nobody knew about. I had two Abortions. WHen my family said they were disowning me. I did not know what or to whom to turn. I was invited to church... I went, and I left my box filled with all those secrets there. I received God's forgiveness! From that day forward, I knew I was truly forgiven. God had taken me and washed me clean... I was Free. I turned away from my past and began a New LIfe! If he can do that for someone like me - He can forgive and set you free too!

name: Faith
description:
designed in soft Pima form fitting cotton, for all day comfort.
Sizes
Medium, Large, XXL 
Care Machine wash tumble dry low

100 % Cotton, Combed Ring Spun, Pre - laundered Fabric 4.3 oz

FAITH

She called and asked: "are you sitting down….? Jamie had a stroke!"
His head is swelling, and if it does not stop, the Doctors said they would have to drill a hole in his head to relieve the pressure.
If he does survive, he will have memory loss and will need to relearn how to walk, and most of his motor skills will be affected. (He won’t be the same)
Jamie called me the next day at 4 a.m. He said: "I want you to take all my notes on running and use them if you choose to."
I told him: "you're not dying. You have come too far; I will be out there tomorrow."
When I arrived, he was holding his head in pain (this from a man who was a boxer)
I talked with my friend to see what he wanted, and above all,l I prayed.
As we talked, the doctors and Jamie decided they would operate the next day.
But God had a different plan. You see, by the next day, Jamie felt better. His comment to me: "Help a brother up. When this comes, I want to face it standing."
Just leaning forward made him sick.
As the day went on, we talked on about his favorite topic of running. 
I don’t know what it was, but Jamie started making a turn around, and no surgery was needed.
Jamie had something to say to me, and it was this:
“I'M GOING TO WALK WITH YOU OUT OF THIS HOSPITAL.”
So we began ….First he leaned forward. Then he leaned over the edge and tried to stand up. Later he stood up and took a step. Another time, he took a few steps; finally, he walked to the door!! Real success came when we walked around the entire intensive care unit!
After we finished that walk, he asked me:"Do you have a stop watch?"
My Friend Jamie did walk me out of that hospital.
Some time later in conversation, he was telling me the doctors didn’t understand how he could have done this because in the CATSCANS there were black spots on his brain... (Dead brain cells from the extreme heat 
and pressure)
They say it’s not possible what he is doing with his body now without extensive therapy and time.

Of course, they don’t know my friend Jamie’s FAITH - it's Unshakable!

name: Tribulation - Black
description:
designed in soft Pima form fitting cotton, for all day comfort.
Sizes
Medium, Large, XXL 
Care Machine wash tumble dry low

Black/ Blue /Tan
100 % Cotton, Combed Ring Spun, Pre - laundered Fabric 4.3 oz

TRIBULATION

He turned to me and said: "I have not eaten in about 3 days... (You see I can’t have my daughter go without so I do)"
He said: "Sometimes I can go a week with no food." 
My friend was going through a second divorce. He had no car, so he would wake up at 4:30 a.m. and ride his bike to work 17 miles to his 1st job… finishing at 3, then bicycling to his next job and working till 9pm…… He would then bicycle home 17 miles again, sleep a little, then wake up at 1am to deliver newspapers.
He did this for several years, and I never heard him complain -He was always happy and would do anything for you.
So what will you be in your Tribulation?
More Happy, Patient, Grateful, Disciplined.
When you get up in the morning and face the day, remember there are people like you in the world living a Tribulation.
By the way, Jamie married the Love of his life. They live in Texas and own several properties.
He has since lived through being hit by a car 5 times and defied science by living through a major stroke and is now training to set a world record in the 100 meter dash.

What will you be now?

name: Anything is Possible
description:
designed in soft Pima form fitting cotton, for all day comfort.

Care Machine wash tumble dry low

100 % Cotton, Combed Ring Spun, Pre - laundered Fabric 4.3 oz


My dad taught me well... 
I was 5 years old when I had my first lesson. 
My dad took me to a local bar and it was there that 
I learned and saw adult behavior... 
I saw things a small child should not see. 
Watching my father I learned my ways of anger, 
destruction, drinking and womanizing. 
I used them in school and in my marriage; 
I fought with people my wife and anyone else 
that would provoke me. 
I hit and abused my wife and killed when I was in the war. 
I had no value or respect for anyone or myself. 
I was on a road that would end in the penitentiary or death... 
One night I reached my breaking point and 
waited with a loaded gun to shoot and kill my family. 
As I commenced to destroy the house I hit the TV with the rifle 
And it came on with a pastor talking about God. 
His words of forgiveness and love pierced my soul like arrows. 
It was then that I dropped to my knees and asked God into my life. 
It was then that I turned from my old ways and began a new life. 
If God can forgive and give a new life to a man like me imagine 
what he can do for you! 
"Anything is possible" with God!
